类型: Size: 8-8.5 Wide Women/6-6.5 Wide MenColor: White/Blue
评论详情: I am of the age where my doctor recommended I no longer walk around barefoot.  I always have loved going barefoot, and also have worn Birkenstocks for decades, so I researched to find something that would let me have support like my Birks but feel more like I was still barefoot.  What I found were these.  I absolutely LOVE them!!  While I am using them for wear inside the home, I understand that one can wear them outside as well.  I also think they'll be great shoes when travelling by plane as they're so easy to get on and off!  I would recommend them to anyone, and if they truly do help with improving balance, then I'd say all of us of a certain age could benefit from them all the more!  Try them!

评论概述: Comfortable, Supportive, and Ideal for Daily Wear
类型: Size: 8-8.5 Wide Women/6-6.5 Wide MenColor: White/Red
评论详情: The Lorax Summer Barefoot Shoes have been a game changer for my wife’s comfort and foot health. She’s worn them for less than a day and already loves how they feel. The wide toe box gives her toes plenty of space to relax naturally, and the breathable material keeps her feet cool while reducing discomfort, which is perfect for conditions like neuropathy and arthritis. These shoes also promote better posture and skeletal alignment, which is a big plus. Lightweight and versatile, they’ve quickly become her go-to for daily wear.
